item.title: Contact

item.content:encoded:

Send us a message

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="24px"][dt_contact_form fields="name,email,telephone,message" message_height="4" required="name,email,message" button_title="Send message" button_size="medium"][vc_empty_space height="40px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12"][vc_column_text]

How to find us

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="24px"][vc_gmaps link="#E-8_" size="310"][vc_empty_space height="45px"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-xs-12"][vc_column_text]

Contact information

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="18px"][vc_column_text]Address: 8500 Beverly Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90048 [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="16px"][vc_column_text]Phone numbers: (424) 123-0045, (424) 123-0067[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="16px"][vc_column_text]Email: sales@yoursite.com[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="16px"][vc_column_text]We are open: Monday – Friday 10 AM – 8 PM[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="16px"][vc_column_text]Social links:[dt_social_icons animation="none"][dt_social_icon target_blank="true" icon="facebook" link="https://www.facebook.com/WordPress.Premium.Theme" /][dt_social_icon target_blank="true" icon="twitter" link="https://twitter.com/premium_theme" /][dt_social_icon target_blank="true" icon="google" link="https://plus.google.com/‎" /][dt_social_icon target_blank="true" icon="dribbble" link="http://dribbble.com/dream-theme" /][dt_social_icon target_blank="true" icon="pinterest" link="http://pinterest.com/dreamtheme/" /][dt_social_icon target_blank="true" icon="instagram" link="http://instagram.com/dream_theme_photo" /][/dt_social_icons][/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height="40px"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
